website_summaries.verdict: A large unicorn with attention-grabbing light, sound, and motion features that toddlers find especially appealing. Sturdy, easy to operate, and reasonably priced.
pros: Features a moving head, flapping wings, a "walking" mechanism, and more than 40 sound and music variations
Magic Point fairy activates motion and comes with own set of charming phrases, songs, and sounds
Compatible with other SmartFriends playset characters
cons: Some parents felt that the features were too simple for older kids

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: The speaker in the unicorn and fairy are pretty poor and the unicorn makes a ton of noise walking. The lights are great, it walks well on tile, and I love the flapping unicorn wings. I was also disappointed at the packaging. It came in a brown box without a photo of what it is and what it does, which is less than exciting for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the most beautiful unicorn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beautiful unicorn for my daughter since she loves them and is delighted is an excellent gift. I arrive well packed and the item in good condition. The shipment was fast. Without hesitation, they already acquire that their girls would like very much to have this article in their home, they can check my images that works well and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: My daughters favorite toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 8th unicorn of this kind I have bought my daughter. I dread the day I can no longer find it to replace the broken ones. I have a collection of unicorn heads of the ones she’s broken. She is 5 years old had autism, this has been her FAVORITE toy since she was almost three years old.
customer_reviews.author: Melly S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Cute gift, makes noise and the dolls that’s included sings. I also enjoy the carrot, makes for great interaction.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle the Unicorn
customer_reviews.text: Twinkle is a wonderful birthday gift for my granddaughter. It walks, talks, plays songs and flaps its wings. Let’s just say it brought joy and a “Twinkle “ to my grandchild’s eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: A Birthday present for my Greatgrandaughter...
customer_reviews.text: My Great Granddaughter has a love for unicorns at a new age of 4 years... And this little Unicorn is so appealing...Talks and walks and made friends so quickly...She really loved my present...It was her older sister that gave me the clue as to what to buy her, and thanks to Amazon, it worked out well...
customer_reviews.author: Jan/c

customer_reviews.title: A pleasing toy for a 2 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my Granddaughter for her 2nd Birthday. She just loves playing for it on hard floors. Doesn’t work well on carpets. Definitely work it to see her smile! I’ve seen her use it over and over and she favors this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Tara RN

customer_reviews.title: Happy 3 year old
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 3 year old granddaughter, she has the castles, princesses, fairies and mermaids; but she needed the Alicorn (winged unicorn). She absolutely loves it. Easy and sturdy to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any little unicorn lover!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute! Bought it for my nieces birthday. Frustration free just means it came in an enclosed box and was wrapped in plastic wrap so super easy to open which is awesome! The unicorn walks Around and makes noises and the little doll also makes noises.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: rough edges
customer_reviews.text: Hard plastic, rough edges. Not good for very young children & not really fun for older ones.
customer_reviews.author: E. Roxanna Brockert

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old loves this unicorn it's one the few toys she plays with for long periods of time. It plays music and can walk around. I would definitely recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Lil girl toys
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters absolutely loved it and it works great on carpet too

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy! Got it for my granddaughter for Christmas! She loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packed

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS UNICORN!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. She is 18 months and enjoys the Go! Go! Smart Friends items. This one in particular is so cute because the unicorn moves. It definitely keeps her occupied for a while.

product_meta.title: VTech Go! Go! Smart Friends Twinkle the Magical Unicorn (Frustration Free Packaging)
product_meta.description: Soar with Twinkle the Magical Unicorn from the VTech Go! Go! Smart Friends kingdom. Press the enchanting unicorn's buttons, and she will walk forward, move her head and flap her wings. Place the included MagicPoint character, fairy Prisma, on one of Twinkle's two MagicPoint locations to trigger delightful responses, sounds, motion and lights. Feed her the golden carrot when she's hungry. Create a whole kingdom with princesses, princes, magical creatures and more with Go! Go! Smart Friends characters and playsets (sold separately). requires 2 AAA batteries for fairy Prisma MagicPoint character (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use) and 4 AA batteries for Twinkle the Magical Unicorn (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use). Intended for ages 18 months to 5 years. Gender: Unisex
feature_bullets: Soar with Twinkle the Magical Unicorn from the VTech Go! Go! Smart Friends kingdom; press the buttons on Twinkle the Magical Unicorn and she will walk forward, move her head and flap her wings
Two MagicPoint locations bring Twinkle and the Go! Go! Smart Friends characters to life with fun phrases, lights and more; Twinkle's light-up horn even changes color
Includes fairy Prisma MagicPoint character and a golden carrot accessory for more role-play fun; works with other Go! Go! Smart Friends characters and playsets (sold separately)
Create a whole kingdom featuring princesses, princes, magical creatures and more with Go! Go! Smart Friends characters and playsets (sold separately)
Requires 2 AAA and 4 AA batteries (batteries included for demo purposes only; new batteries recommended for regular use); intended for ages 18 months to 5 years
